title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: When entering an XPath expression for the column mapping in the XML Edit Data Set dialog, such as 'section[@id='left']', the selection is stripped and stored in the filterInfo HashMap. However, when leaving the dialog, the RelationInformation is persisted to .rptdesign, but the data stored in filterInfo is lost. Treating XPath expressions in this manner can lead to potential issues.
